body: Heyyy I’m looking for Foster Care AUs with Irondad and Spiderson. Like Tony seeing Peter for some reason and being like ‘That’s the one. That’s the one I want to be my family’, preferably of Peter’s already grown up like 14-ish years old but at this point I’ll take whatever. If you know some tell me the name pleaseee I’m craving some good adoptions AUs for my favorite father and son duo

summary: Graduation
title: Graduation
body:
Fandom: Avengers
Pairing: Peter Parker & Male!Reader
Summary: You’ve been there for his high school experience, you’re in it for the final lap now.
Word Count: 1,260
Request: “This isn’t a request but more of a suggestion, you should totally make a fic with Peter graduating (with or without a reader), seems like total fluff material and it’s like a little celebration for graduating this year. 💖💖”
A/n: So this is for the anon who has their birthday today (19th May - tis past midnight in UK) if I’m correct you’re also turning 18! So, consider this as a birthday gift. Also, idk what Americans do for graduating high school.

“Mr Stark is having a graduating party for us,” You mumbled as you and Peter get your suit ready at his apartment, you were fixing his crooked and badly tied tie.

Tony had you and Peter go to a tailoring shop for your graduating suits, or better yet, suit pants, shirt and waistcoat, as you had complained that a three-piece suit or any type of suit was far too fancy for graduating so you, Peter and Tony found a compromise.

Tony was buzzing to go to his practically adopted sons graduation. Aunt May was one supportive Aunt, she was making sure her phone, iPad and camera were all charged for this moment. You had sent invitations out for Tony, Pepper, Happy and Rhodey to come along, which they all happily accepted.

“Hey, at least Flash can stop being a dick to us for pretending we know Tony,” You smiled at your best friend as you sweep off any dirt off his shoulder.

You both looked in the full-length mirror as Peter and you stare. You and he have been through thick and thin. He always left sorry for you, he was an orphan, yes, but he had Aunt May. You had virtually no one, no family alive. You got through it, especially you found a family who loves you unconditionally.

You had Tony, the father figure you always wanted. He was serious, playful and caring. He was always to celebrate your achievement and whilst he was a busy man, he was always made sure to call you up to check up on you and always get Happy to fill in any details of you.

Pepper was your mother figure in your life, so, whenever you had missions, she would immediately see if you’re okay. She would check for any injuries, even if Tony had checked before, before engulfing you into a tight hug, which you readily accept.

Happy and Rhodey were your uncles, entertaining, fun and somehow adapted asthma with the amount of unnecessary loud sighing they do around you. 

Aunt May had loved that she’s practically adopted another nephew who legally has you in her care. You sleep on the top bunk in Peter’s room, but despite being in her care for months, she still finds you asleep on the sofa, afraid you’re invading Peter’s personal bubble.

But, Peter. Peter was your brother, he was your best friend, but more importantly your brother. You and he acted like any other brothers. You fight over the tv remote, you shared clothes and get annoyed with each other for using something without permission. You two loved and hated each other, protect each other’s back and annoy each other.

You started high school together as strangers and came out of high school as brothers. 

“MJ and Ned have been flooding the group chat if we could get KFC before the party tonight,” You nudged him with your shoulder, “What do you say? We make Happy take a detour?”

“He’ll get annoyed,” Peter laughs, but giving you a knowing look, “Of course, we are!”

“Where are my boys?” Aunt May screams throughout the apartment that both of you were sure that the whole building could hear her, “I need pictures in the living room.”

“How long do you think this would take?” Peter asked as you chuckled.

“We took almost a hundred pictures for prom, bro, that was before we even left home,” You responded, “This is why we’re on a tight schedule.”

“I doubt she’ll stick with it.”

You and Peter were still wearing your gowns as you both wear your caps, you two were laughing at some stupid jokes that Peter was cracking. Ned had gone out to find his family as MJ went to venture out hers. You and Peter were off as two brothers looking for their family. 

“Look for a crowd,” Peter reasons, thinking of where your family was located, “They’ll flock to see Mr Stark.”

“Pete, it’s Tony, how many times does Tony have to say that?” You teased as you go on your tiptoes to see if you could see any familiar features, “Maybe we should look for a strawberry hair lady?”

“Miss Potts is always easier to find,” Peter agrees.

“Boys!” You both hear, swirling around to see the group of oddballs radiating towards you and Peter.

Aunt May was the first to wrap her arms around both you and Peter, sharing the hug as she tightens her grip around you two, for two superheroes, both you and Peter groan at the force. Before she lets go and gives you individual hugs and kisses. Then, in came Tony, who gave you two grins and engulfing you into a hug.

“My two favourite nerds,” He teases as both you and Peter tighten the hug. 

Soon, Tony was engulfing you and Peter separately, then getting individual hugs from Pepper, Rhodey and even Happy gave you a hug. Then, pictures were being taken, there were too many cameras and phones to look out. The moment had to be captured on May’s, Tony’s, Peter’s and your phone, plus May’s iPad.

Pictures were full of your family, some with Peter, some without him. Trio pictures to group pictures, but you hadn’t gotten a picture with Peter. Just Peter and you, no May in the middle or Tony in the middle. 

“Nice cap, (Y/n), think you have Parker’s,” Rhodey points out as he sees your cap designed.

But, when you turn to grin at him, taking your cap off to show it off to the adults, “Nah, I made it myself.”

It was a Spiderman design cap, full of red, white and blue. You were beaming happily as Peter turns to look at you as he takes off his cap, he shows to the adults to find that he had designed his cap with your Superhero logo. The adults’ smile turns to a soft frown before they were smiling again.

These boys in front of them just care too much about each other that they dedicated their cap to each other. Their smile grew bigger when they saw their boys beaming at each other. 

“Boys, you need another picture!” May waves her hand to signal to get together, push yourself to station yourself next to him. 

“Another picture? Another few dozen,” Peter complained but there was a fond smile on his lip as May pretends to be mad at her nephew’s complaint.

You and he wrap your arms around each other shoulders, gripping each other’s gown as you use your other hand to point at him. Pictures after pictures and changing poses each time. One picture consisted of you two doing your superhero pose and then mocking each other’s superhero pose.

Some pictures had him carrying you on his back, or you bridal carrying him. Making funny faces or simply a picture capturing you fixing his cap or him straightening your gown. 

But, there was one picture for the picture frame that was surely going to be on the wall of the Stark home, Parker apartment and the Avengers base. It was a picture of you and Peter looking at each other, admiration filled eyes.

A moment shared between two graduating high schoolers, you were talking to him.

“We’ve made them proud, Pete,” You nodded, referring to your deceased family, Peter’s eyes soften as he grips the area between your neck and shoulder tightly.

“I’m proud of you, bro.”

You grinned at him and he beams back right at you, like a little ray of sunshine.

“I’m proud of you too.”

“Boys, you need another picture!” May waves her hand to signal to get together, push yourself to station yourself next to him. 

“Another picture? Another few dozen,” Peter complained but there was a fond smile on his lip as May pretends to be mad at her nephew’s complaint.

You and he wrap your arms around each other shoulders, gripping each other’s gown as you use your other hand to point at him. Pictures after pictures and changing poses each time. One picture consisted of you two doing your superhero pose and then mocking each other’s superhero pose.

Some pictures had him carrying you on his back, or you bridal carrying him. Making funny faces or simply a picture capturing you fixing his cap or him straightening your gown. 

But, there was one picture for the picture frame that was surely going to be on the wall of the Stark home, Parker apartment and the Avengers base. It was a picture of you and Peter looking at each other, admiration filled eyes.

A moment shared between two graduating high schoolers, you were talking to him.

“We’ve made them proud, Pete,” You nodded, referring to your deceased family, Peter’s eyes soften as he grips the area between your neck and shoulder tightly.

“I’m proud of you, bro.”

You grinned at him and he beams back right at you, like a little ray of sunshine.

“I’m proud of you too.”
trail.content_abstract:
Fandom: Avengers
Pairing: Peter Parker & Male!Reader
Summary: You’ve been there for his high school experience, you’re in it for the final lap now.
Word Count: 1,260
Request: “This isn’t a request but more of a suggestion, you should totally make a fic with Peter graduating (with or without a reader), seems like total fluff material and it’s like a little celebration for graduating this year. 💖💖”
A/n: So this is for the anon who has their birthday today (19th May - tis past midnight in UK) if I’m correct you’re also turning 18! So, consider this as a birthday gift. Also, idk what Americans do for graduating high school.

“Mr Stark is having a graduating party for us,” You mumbled as you and Peter get your suit ready at his apartment, you were fixing his crooked and badly tied tie.

Tony had you and Peter go to a tailoring shop for your graduating suits, or better yet, suit pants, shirt and waistcoat, as you had complained that a three-piece suit or any type of suit was far too fancy for graduating so you, Peter and Tony found a compromise.

Tony was buzzing to go to his practically adopted sons graduation. Aunt May was one supportive Aunt, she was making sure her phone, iPad and camera were all charged for this moment. You had sent invitations out for Tony, Pepper, Happy and Rhodey to come along, which they all happily accepted.

body:
And Now For Something Completely Twisted

Hey friendos! I’ve started a new serial on Archive Of Our Own. It is called “Captured” and features an Evil Symbrock/Peter Parker pairing. If you scoff at Archive Warnings and Trigger Warnings, you should check it out.

Seriously though, it is NOT for the sensitive reader. More info below the cut.

You are responsible for your own reading habits and for knowing your emotional limits.

Captured

Trigger warnings for: themes of incest, underage (16), sexual violence, and abusive relationships. It is twisted and hot in all the wrong (right?) ways. Might cause chest pains and weird pants sensations.

Please, please, please don’t read this if you’re under 18. Go chew on a Tide Pod and wait a few years.

Viewer discretion advised.

Reality check: Because I don’t know you, I feel compelled to say this. If you’re actually in a relationship which resembles this in any way, get the fuck out of it NOW. No one should ever treat you this way. Ever. This behavior is not ok. EVER. In real life, there’s nothing sexy about it. This is just a fantasy.

He’s just adorable

tags: I'm already too deep into headcanons now so why should I stop
summary: Tony being a ghost and Stephen being the only one to see him: Headcanons
body:
Tony being a ghost and Stephen being the only one to see him: Headcanons

More Headcanons, because why should I ever stop

  • Like, it’s the funeral and Stephen’s still standing next to the lake before something just floats right to his side
  • “God, this is really sad.”
  • Stephen practically has a heart attack before he realizes that Tony is standing next to him, all shiny and transparent
  • But since no one else can see him, everyone just saw Stephen jump for no reason, which results in a rather uncomfortable silence (it doesn’t last that long but still)
  • Anyways, Tony’s fucking relieved because he sorta thought he’s doomed to be ignored forever (and he hates being ignored, that attention seeking idiot)
  • So after watching his family for awhile he starts following Stephen, who tries to figure out why Tony is still attached to the world of the living
  • Things get worse when Tony figures out how to move objects. Well, he doesn’t, not at first, it just kinda happens
  • “Tony, stop moving the Cauldron of the Cosmos.”
  • “That isn’t me- oh no wait, that is me.”
  • Over time, Stephen can see how much Tony would love to talk to Pepper, Morgan, Harley and Peter - he just doesn’t know if he should. Nevertheless, the next time he sees Morgan, he gives her an ouija board
  • Tony beams when he tells him about it. That’s when Tony starts talking to his daughter (and to Harley and Peter. After their first normal conversation, those idiot children start to make a ritual out of it, with candles and shit. At this point, Pepper is too afraid to ask)
  • However, Tony asks the kids to help Pepper in various and subtle ways and they do so gladly. They start to call themselves Ghostbusters and Tony becomes Casper thanks to Morgan (he’s not amused)
  • One time, Stephen has some sort of an astral projection fight with some other wizard and they end up in the Sanctum
  • And Tony is just chilling until he sees those two floating around. Things aren’t looking too good for Stephen so obviously, Tony tries to help - and this time, he can touch and fight because everyone’s sorta like a ghost, but nobody can kill him because, well, he’s dead
  • Since then Stephen kinda expects Tony to help him whenever possible and Tony complains most of the time (even though he’s happy that he can finally do something)
  • After a huge amount of research they figure out that ghosts only stay on earth if someone can’t let them go
  • So that’s when Stephen has to talk to e v e r y o n e, which results in a lot of awkward situations (Tony, however, is having the time of his life… or death, or whatever)
  • And even though Tony is dearly missed, they can’t find anyone who still hasn’t found peace with his death
  • Until they do. And it’s Stephen
  • That’s when they finally talk about everything, about all the things Stephen carried around with him. They talk about Titan, the only possibility to save the universe, about guilt and whatever. And Tony reassures him that none of this is his fault, that it was his own decision to sacrifice himself and that it was that purple grapefruit they had to blame
  • “I saw this future quite early and I searched so long to find another one. I did, I really did, but-”
  • “There was no other way.”
  • Tony stays for awhile after that, stays on earth until one day, Stephen can’t find Tony anywhere. He’s gone. And even though he left a void, Stephen feels (almost, kinda, just a tiny bit more) at peace

summary: Writing Challenge - ends September 6, 2019 ** indicates series **Come Back To Me (Peter Parker x Reader) by @southsideavalon...
caption:
• Writing Challenge - ends September 6, 2019
  • ** indicates series

**Come Back To Me (Peter Parker x Reader) by @southsideavalon

Summary: Based of Good Times by All Time Low

(In)Security (Harrison Osterfield x Reader) by @summernykole 

Summary: Prompt #23: “Fuck me for caring, I guess.”

**If I Can’t Have You (Peter Parker x Reader) by @etudaire-writes

Summary: Based off If I Can’t Have You by Shawn Mendes

**Rooming Together (Peter Parker x Reader) by @satellitespidey

Summary: Y/N is a 20 year old Psychology major going to NYU and living in the wonderful city of New York. Her roommate Rosie has just gotten engaged to her long term boyfriend and decided to move in with him, leaving her without a roommate. That is, until Peter.

Unrest (Peter Parker x Reader) by @faefictions

Summary: ENDGAME SPOILERS. After getting dusted by Thanos, the reader tries to cope with what she missed in the five years she was dead and the aftermath of returning

**One More Cup? (Tom Holland x Reader) by @parkerpeterholland

Summary: A small coffee shop hidden away in the streets of London, a budding young actress who couldn’t catch a break and an actor that had just gotten his career defining role. You know what they say everything happens for a reason right?

Till I See You Again (Tony Stark x Reader) by @all-alone-he-turns-to-stone

Summary: ENDGAME SPOILERS. They say you never forget your first love. He didn’t. He couldn’t. He tried. Until…

Inhale, Exhale (Tom Holland x Reader) by @mytrashs-blog

Summary: Your anxiety is just getting worse and worse, but you have a pretty good support system.

Sorry, I’m Late (Tom Holland x Reader) by @breathinginthevapor 

Summary: Your best friend Tom Holland has agreed to be your date to your high school reunion, but when bumping into your ex, you might “accidentally” tell him the two of you are dating…

You’re The Cutest (Peter Parker x Reader) by @hopeless-starry-kingdom

Summary: Peter just loves when you wear his clothes

Wanna Dance? (40′s!Bucky Barnes x Reader) by @la–vie–en–rosie

Summary: Maybe going out dancing was a good idea after all…

Master Plan (Peter Parker x OC) by @spiderkat1248

Summary: Emma tries to get Peter Parker’s attention

**All I Want (Peter Parker x Reader) by @peterpenisparkers

Summary: without her, what’s peter supposed to do now?

Am I Dreaming? (Peter Parker x Reader) by @softiespidey

Summary: you and peter have had better dreams than this.

Safe (Mob!Tom Holland x Male!Reader) by @petersboyfriendsonofthor​

Summary: Prompt: Mob AU
